description:
A detective in Japan, and also Selecao`s No. 4. After spending almost all of his money without accomplishing the mission given by Mr. Outside, he steals Akira`s phone in order to take possession of his cash.
His plans are however flustered when he is informed by Juiz that a Selecao`s money can only be used by its rightful owner. He is then killed by his wife while attempting to return the phone, but warns him of how dangerous the game is before dying.
name: Kondou Yuusei
